about_the_game: The third album of songs written for the world of Hunt: Showdown 1896 by Port Sulphur Band, released to celebrate the game’s moon-themed event cycle. The album includes both mp3s and high-resolution audio files.
detailed_description: The third album of songs written for the world of Hunt: Showdown 1896 by Port Sulphur Band, released to celebrate the game’s moon-themed event cycle. The album includes both mp3s and high-resolution audio files.
